function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased contact between biting insect vectors, animal hosts, and humans due to deforestation.","Impact":"Higher risk of spreading diseases like malaria, leishmaniasis, Chagas disease, and trypanosomiasis.","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce vector breeding sites, controlling insect populations, and promoting protective agricultural practices.","Technologies":"Insecticides, land use planning, vector control methods.","People":"Populations living in deforested areas, agricultural workers, local communities near deforested zones.","Owner":"Government health agencies, agricultural organizations, local and international NGOs."},{"Description":"Changes in vegetation and land cultivation dynamics due to deforestation shifting vector-animal relations.","Impact":"Altered disease transmission dynamics and increased risk of vector-borne diseases.","Mitigation":"Implementing protective agricultural practices, controlling insect populations, and promoting sustainable land use management.","Technologies":"Land use planning, insecticides, agricultural best practices.","People":"Agricultural workers, local communities near deforested zones.","Owner":"Agricultural organizations, local and international NGOs."}]}
